title: American Wines Gain Favor Amid Reopening
itunes:title: American Wines Gain Favor Amid Reopening
description:
David Duncan, CEO at Silver Oak Winery, discusses how the pandemic has impacted the U.S. wine industry and what the future holds.

Host: Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
